_header: Sith the time that God was born
Note: For the text of the First Version see 4907.
_description: Guy of Warwick (Second Version) — 11976 lines in couplets.

CULFf238.First Lines:
Sythe þe tyme þat god was borneAnd Crystendome was set
                    & swornemane aventewres hathe be falleThat ȝyt be not knowen
                    all…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…And to hys modur also now ryghtThat they vs brynge to
                    þat blys brygh
CULFf238.Note: Lines 7261-8024, 8541-9874 appear in Cambridge, Caius 107; see 4907.
CULFf238.Attributed Title:
Guy Earl of Warwik (f. 161ra, added by later hand to top
                    margin)
